NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Aerospace and Implementation or the cell corresponding to Biomedical and Patents?
Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Data and Development or the cell corresponding to Data and Implementation?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Data} and {Implementation} has a higher heat value.

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Aerospace and Publications or the cell corresponding to Biomedical and Testing?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Aerospace} and {Publications} has a higher heat value.

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Biomedical and Commercialization or the cell corresponding to Materials and Commercialization?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Biomedical} and {Commercialization} has a higher heat value.
